content.question: Which of the following statements would the author of the passage most likely agree with?

choices.label: Average citizens cannot be trusted to vote because of low levels of education.
Nations with extended territory cannot fairly represent their citizens in a republican form of government.
The federal government should have greater authority than state legislatures.
A small federal legislature is the best way to represent the will of the people in a large country.

content.answer: Nations with extended territory cannot fairly represent their citizens in a republican form of government.
